meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Dave Gingold John Alberti Tom Morrison Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #1640.

td.p: Dave Gingold, a law student from Eugene, Oregon
John Alberti, a college professor originally from Los Angeles, California
Tom Morrison, an accountant originally from Memphis, Tennessee (whose 1-day cash winnings total $10,000)

tr.td: ISLANDS
NO. 1 HITS OF THE '60s
THE FUNNIES
MEDALS & DECORATIONS
BOWLING
2—LETTER WORDS
